Html:
Hi,

I have implemented a mock up Golf Club site using an extended Personal Starter Kit by J Wadsworth. This site is available at the 2nd link below. I will now install this new beta version and see how it compares.

Looks good so far. Is there an Administration login I can use to look at the administration facilities? I cannot see it in the ASP.NET forums or on CodePlex.

http://www.mawhitfield.net
http://www.worsleypark.mawhitfield.net

Cheers

NonStopMark.

The default admin login is username and password 'admin' but you can add your own and then administer the roles via '~/admin/manageusers.aspx'.

Sorry I didn't make that clear.

Thanks

Zack Owens

Cheers Zack. All looks good so far. Plenty of work been done to extend it I see. Very impressive. I will put it online at some point and test it further. If I spot any glaring issues I will relay them to you. Had a couple of JavaScript Length errors on trying to remove the news item but this seemed to correct itself eventually.

Tried to logout from one of the pages but it left the text to logged in. As such this then gave me an error when I clicked it again. I wonder if this is down to caching. I haven't checked the pages as yet but I had this proble when I was using the OutputCache directive. I can be more specific when I have tried it out further with some of my own database entries.

Thanks for the moment.

Cheers

MARK
www.mawhitfield.net
